Package nom.bdezonia.zorbage.sampling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Sampling<T>
    Sampling defines the base class for samplings of all types.
    SamplingIterator<T>
    SamplingIterator defines how to iterate Samplings.
    SupportsBoundsCalc<U>
    SupportsBoundCalcs is a helper interface so that some types can be made to allow their bounds to be calculated easily by the Bounds class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bounds
    Bounds is a private class with a static public calculation method for finding the real or integer space bounds of a Sampling.
    IntegerIndex
    IntegerIndex defines an n-dimensional integer space point.
    RealIndex
    RealIndex defines an n-dimensional real space point.
    SamplingCartesianIntegerGrid
    SamplingCartesianIntegerGrid is an n-dimensional Sampling that spans a user defined region of Euclidean space.
    SamplingCartesianRealGrid
    SamplingCartesianRealGrid is an n-dimensional Sampling that spans a user defined region of Euclidean space.
    SamplingComplement
    SamplingComplement is a sampling that represents the difference between a sampling's bounds and it's actual members.
    SamplingConditional<T extends Allocatable<T> & Settable<T> & DimensionCount>
    SamplingConditional is a Sampling that includes the points of another Sampling that match a specified Condition.
    SamplingCylindricalRealGrid
    SamplingCylindricalGrid is a 3-d Sampling in real cylindrical space.
    SamplingDifference<T extends Allocatable<T> & DimensionCount & Settable<T>>
    SamplingDifference is a Sampling that includes the points of a first Sampling that are not present in a second Sampling.
    SamplingGeneral<U extends Duplicatable<U> & DimensionCount & Settable<U>>
    SamplingGeneral is a Sampling where the point coordinates are added individually and can include grids of any shape.
    SamplingIntersection<T extends Allocatable<T> & DimensionCount & Settable<T>>
    SamplingIntersection is a Sampling that iterated the set of points common to two other Samplings.
    SamplingPolarRealGrid
    SamplingPolarGrid is a 2-d Sampling in real polar space.
    SamplingSphericalRealGrid
    SamplingSphericalGrid is a 3-d Sampling in real spherical space.
    SamplingSymmetricDifference<T extends Allocatable<T> & DimensionCount & Settable<T>>
    SamplingSymmetricDifference is a Sampling that iterates the set of points that are disjoint between two other Samplings.
    SamplingUnion<T extends Allocatable<T> & DimensionCount & Settable<T>>
    SamplingUnion is a Sampling that iterates the set of points that make up the sum of the two sets of points of two other Samplings.
